content: **knitted top in drops paris piece is knitted in stocking stitch with edges in rib size s - xxxl** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern w-807 yarn group c or a + a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 200-200-200-250-250-300 g colour 65 rust **knitting gauge ** 17 stitches in width and 22 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops circular needle size 5 mm length 60 or 80 cm for stocking stitch drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 60 or 80 cm for rib needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to a larger needle size if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to a smaller needle size
